short_description: Compact two-head servo filler for precise liquid filling up to 1 gallon.
long_description: The PSR Automation Inc. F1000 Servo Filler is a state-of-the-art filling solution engineered for small to medium production runs. It supports 1 or 2 filling nozzles and handles bottles from 2 ounces to 1 gallon with outstanding accuracy.

short_description: Extended-frame F1000 variant for 5-gallon pail filling.
long_description: The F1000-PAIL Servo Pail Filler widens the standard F1000 frame to accommodate larger 5-gallon pails in addition to standard containers, maintaining the same precision and efficiency as the base model.

short_description: High-capacity six-head servo filler based on the 2000-series frame.
long_description: The PSR Automation Inc. F2000 Servo Filler offers 2, 4, or 6 nozzle configurations for medium-volume operations, delivering high-precision filling for liquids and viscous products.

short_description: Flagship 8-head volumetric servo filler for maximum precision and speed.
long_description: The F3000 is PSR’s premier volumetric servo filling system offered in 2 to 8 head configurations. It uses positive displacement lobe pumps and industrial AC servo motors to deliver unmatched accuracy and efficiency for a wide range of liquid products.
key_features: Industrial AC servo motors and drives

short_description: Dual-lane servo filler for high-volume production efficiency.
long_description: The F3000DL Dual Lane Servo Filler minimizes bottle transfer time using two parallel lanes to fill bottles simultaneously, doubling throughput without sacrificing accuracy.
key_features: Dual filling lanes for simultaneous operation
Independent servo control for each head

short_description: Explosion-protected variant of the F3000 for hazardous locations (Class I Div 2).
long_description: The F3000-Hazloc is designed for environments where flammable vapors or products are present. Built to Class I Division 2 standards, it retains the precision and robustness of the standard F3000 model.

short_description: Inline counter-pressure filler for carbonated beverages and sparkling products.
long_description: The CPF1000 employs counter-pressure technology to fill carbonated drinks without loss of CO₂, preserving product integrity and ensuring accurate fills for beer, wine, and kombucha.

short_description: Advanced flow-meter-based filler optimized for thin liquids and caustic solutions.
long_description: The FLM1000 integrates a precision flow meter sensor to measure and dispense exact volumes without contact, eliminating pump wear and providing exceptional accuracy for thin or caustic liquids.
key_features: Ideal for thin and caustic liquids

short_description: Time-based gravity filler for high-speed dispensing of thin liquids.
long_description: The GF1000 uses time-controlled gravity dispensing to fill thin liquids accurately and economically. Constructed entirely from stainless steel, it is ideal for food and industrial applications.

short_description: Inline pressure filler for wide-range container sizes and viscosities.
long_description: The PF1000 is an inline pressure filling system that uses up to 4 nozzles to deliver consistent fills across multiple container sizes and product types, ensuring hygienic and efficient operation.

short_description: Fully automatic piston filler for accurate volume dispensing of liquids and pastes.
long_description: The P1000 Piston Filler combines servo-driven vertical control and dual piston configuration for precise liquid filling. Ideal for food, pharmaceutical, and cosmetic applications requiring consistency and speed.

short_description: Compact tabletop servo filler for lab or small-batch production.
long_description: The S3F is PSR’s most compact servo filling solution designed for laboratories or pilot production. Despite its small size, it provides full servo control and industrial precision.

short_description: Dedicated filler for trigger-pump or spray bottle packaging lines.
long_description: The TP-Series is a specialized servo filler optimized for trigger pump bottles, featuring adjustable stroke filling and automatic neck alignment for consistent output.

short_description: High-capacity filler for drums, totes, and bulk containers.
long_description: The LCF5000 handles filling of large containers up to 275-gallon IBC totes. It combines heavy-duty stainless construction with servo control for precision even at high volumes.

short_description: Inline torque chuck capper for consistent torque-controlled closures.
long_description: The TO1000 Torque Capper applies screw caps using a precision servo-driven torque chuck. Designed for repeatable and reliable torque application on various cap and bottle combinations.

short_description: Servo torque chuck capper for high-speed production lines.
long_description: The TO3000 expands the standard torque chuck capper with dual-head configuration and reinforced 3000-series frame for continuous, high-speed operation.
key_features: Hardened aluminum and stainless steel construction

short_description: Compact servo-driven snap-on capper for press-fit closures.
long_description: The SO1000 Snap-On Capper delivers efficient press-fit capping using servo-controlled pressure heads, ensuring accurate, damage-free closures for snap-on or plug caps.

short_description: Tabletop mini snap-on capper for small-scale or lab use.
long_description: The SO120 is a compact tabletop snap-on capper, ideal for laboratory or pilot production. It offers precision control in a portable design for small container sizes.

short_description: Servo pick-and-place capper for automatic closure placement and torqueing.
long_description: The PD1000 integrates servo-controlled pick-and-place functionality, picking caps from a feeder and applying them with torque precision. Perfect for small bottles and delicate closures.

short_description: Dual-arm high-speed capper for continuous motion capping.
long_description: The PD1500 extends the PD1000 with dual servo arms and rotary continuous motion for high-output lines. It combines efficiency, flexibility, and torque precision at industrial scale.
key_features: Dual servo arms for parallel operation

short_description: Rotary pick-and-place capper designed for continuous high-volume production.
long_description: The PD2000 uses rotary servo control to pick and cap bottles in continuous motion, offering unmatched performance for large-scale bottling lines.

short_description: Press-in plug capper for tamper-evident closures and stopper-style caps.
long_description: The PI5000 applies press-in plugs and stoppers with servo-controlled precision. Designed for consistent insertion depth and uniform pressure across production batches.

short_description: Compact inline chuck capper ideal for small bottle formats.
long_description: The CC1000 Chuck Capper Compact is a cost-effective inline chuck capper with servo torque control for small-format bottles and short production runs.

short_description: Rotary chuck capper for high-speed, continuous production.
long_description: The ROC2000 Rotary Chuck Capper is PSR’s high-speed rotary capping system built on a 2000-series frame. It combines multi-head torque control and continuous motion indexing for top-tier efficiency.

short_description: Automated hopper for smooth and consistent bottle transfer to conveyor systems.
long_description: The BTH Bottle Transfer Hopper is designed to ensure seamless transfer of empty bottles to filling or capping lines. Its vibratory feed and adjustable guides reduce jams and improve throughput consistency.
key_features: Vibratory feed system for consistent flow
Adjustable guides for multiple bottle sizes

short_description: Modular conveyor for bottle or container transport between filling and capping stages.
long_description: The CV1000 modular inline conveyor integrates with PSR’s filling and capping equipment to provide efficient, continuous container movement. Its stainless-steel construction and variable speed drive ensure durability and control.

short_description: Vertical elevator for bottle elevation between conveyors or process levels.
long_description: The EL1000 Bottle Elevator is built for vertical transfer of bottles between multiple conveyor heights. With a cleated belt and photoeye sensors, it ensures consistent bottle spacing and prevents line backups.

short_description: Compact accumulation or unscrambling turntable for small containers.
long_description: The TD120 Turntable is ideal for accumulating or feeding small bottles. It can serve as both an unscrambler at the start of a line or a pack-off table at the end, improving workflow flexibility.

short_description: Automated transfer station for smooth bottle handoff between conveyors.
long_description: The TS1000 Transfer Station synchronizes two conveyor lines, providing a smooth, jam-free transfer of containers between stages in the bottling process. It features servo synchronization and independent belt control.

short_description: Overhead conveyor for bottle stabilization during transfer and capping.
long_description: The TT1000 Top Transfer Conveyor provides top-down stabilization of bottles as they pass between filling and capping stations. It prevents bottle tipping and ensures perfect alignment for downstream automation.

short_description: Automated bottle mixing system for pre-fill agitation of viscous or particulate products.
long_description: The BMA1000 Bottle Mixing Agitator ensures uniform product consistency before filling. Designed for viscous or particulate liquids, it integrates with PSR’s filling lines to deliver consistent mixing action for each batch.
key_features: Stainless steel shaft and paddle assembly

short_description: Custom-engineered mixing agitator with configurable shaft, paddle, and tank dimensions.
long_description: The OTHER-BMA1000 Custom Bottle Mixing Agitator is tailored to specific production needs, allowing for custom shaft lengths, motor torque settings, and tank capacities. Designed for clients requiring unique agitation profiles or integration with non-standard filling equipment.
key_features: Fully configurable tank and shaft design
Integrates with PSR filling and capping lines
